Name: Two Bunch Palms Resort & Spa
CostBasis: Resort guest access, day passes occasionally available
Attributes: ‚ö°Ô∏è Power Heavy, üßò Deep Focus, üíé Luxury, üèä Wellness, üå¥ Desert Retreat
CriticalFieldNotes: Historic wellness resort nestled on 77 acres of desert landscape. Originally established 1940, reimagined as contemporary wellness haven. Famous for 600-year-old mineral-rich lithium hot springs. 67 guestrooms with intimate outdoor patios. 5 outdoor pools, hot springs, spa with 19 therapy rooms, yoga dome. Al fresco dining with excellent vegan/vegetarian options. Adults-only sanctuary. Perfect for creative retreats and deep work sessions. Former celebrity hideaway with incredible restorative energy.

Name: Joshua Tree Starfire House
Attributes: ‚ö°Ô∏è Power Heavy, üßò Deep Focus, üè† Private Space, üåå Stargazing, üî• Desert Vibes
CriticalFieldNotes: Stunning desert retreat with unrivaled 360-degree views of the Joshua Tree landscape. Features hot tub, cowboy pool, whole house surround sound, wood burning stove, and charcoal grill. Set on hundreds of uninhabited acres with some of the darkest skies in California for incredible stargazing. Perfect for extended creative work sessions and digital detox retreats. Iconic desert aesthetic with modern amenities. Near Joshua Tree National Park.
